{{also|读书破万卷}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=读书破万卷|type=2111}}

===Etymology===
A quote from a poem by [[w:Du Fu|Du Fu]]
* Literally: have read more than 10,000 scrolls

===Pronunciation===
{{zh-pron
|m=dúshū pò wàn juàn
|cat=id
}}

===Idiom===
{{zh-idiom}}

# describes someone who is well-read
#: '''讀書破萬卷'''，[[下筆如有神]]。
#: '''''well read''', and an accomplished writer''

====Related terms====
* {{zh-l|讀萬卷書，行萬里路}}
